page.title: 02 HOUSES IN LAURIESTON
page.content: In the village of Laurieston there are 50 houses.32 of these are over 50 years old;some are over 100 years old.Most of the new houses were built between 1960 and 1970. Many of the older houses have been modernized in the past few years.5 of these are holiday houses.All the houses in the village are well kept and have neat and attractive gardens.A small burn runs through the village and here there are the remains of an old water wheel and mill.Most of the houses are in this part of the village which is the main street. The overall picture is of a very attractive little community.
